org.openbel.framework.core.df.cache
Class DefaultCacheableResourceService

java.lang.Object
  org.openbel.framework.core.df.cache.DefaultResourceService
      org.openbel.framework.core.df.cache.DefaultCacheableResourceService
All Implemented Interfaces:
CacheableResourceService, ResourceService
public class DefaultCacheableResourceService
extends DefaultResourceService
implements CacheableResourceService

DefaultCacheableResourceService implements a cacheable resource service that handles BELFramework resource locations.

This service manages the cache at SystemConfiguration.getCacheDirectory().

Author:
Anthony Bargnesi <abargnesi@selventa.com>

Method Detail

resolveResource

public ResolvedResource resolveResource(ResourceType type,
                                        String location)
                                 throws ResourceDownloadError
Resolves the BELFramework resource with a specific type and located at location.

Specified by:
resolveResource in interface CacheableResourceService
Parameters:
type - ResourceType, the resource type
location - String, the resource location
Returns:
ResolvedResource, the resource resolved in the cache indicating the action taken
Throws:
ResourceDownloadError - Thrown if the resource could not be downloaded from location and if that resource was not located in the cache
